vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Παῦλος, -ου, ὁ (Lat. Paulus),
__1. Sergius Paulus: Act.13:7.
__2. the Apostle Paul (cf. Σαῦλος): Act.13:9, and frequently throughout Ac., Rom.1:1, 1Co.1:1, al., 2Pe.3:15.
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)

vocabinfos.mediumDef: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.7.58; also called Saul frequently
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Pablo: (1) el apóstol ; (2) Sergio Paulo, gobernador de Chipre (HCH.13:7)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
保羅 这个陽性專有名詞在拉丁文的意思是 「小的或少的」
1) 保羅是有名的使徒之一, 寫了十三卷保羅書信.
2) 士求保羅是居比路 (塞浦路斯) 的方伯 (即省長) , 聽說為人精明
(徒 13:7)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
保罗这个阳性专有名词在拉丁文的意思是「小的或少的」
1) 保罗是有名的使徒之一, 写了十三卷保罗书信.
2) 士求保罗是居比路(塞浦路斯) 的方伯(即省长) , 听说为人精明
(徒13:7)
vocabinfos._vi_Definition: Phao-lô có nghĩa là nhỏ. Phao-lô thành Tarsus; Phau-lút (Sê-giúp).

vocabinfos.mediumDef: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.13.7
